title: Penthouse Studio with Short Term leases & Furnishings!
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Live Vibrantly, in the center of it all, at Mia Palo Alto.', 'With our finger-on-the-pulse, Mia provides stellar downtown living.', 'Blocks from inspired cuisine, shopping and nightlife, Mia is a luxury high-rise outfitted for the urban pioneer, stacked with thoughtfully designed homes and lifestyle enhancements, such as a modern fitness center and a heated swimming pool.', "See what's available—a modern studio or Junior one-bedroom.", 'Wake up daily to our breathtaking view of the mountains from one of our top floor apartment homes!', 'We are now offering in person tours!', ' Self guided and virtual tours are still available.', ' Our entire leasing process from viewing available homes, executing your lease, to moving in, will all be done safely and in adherence to all social distancing guidelines.', ' Our leasing team is available to support your needs in our office, via phone, email and video during normal business hours.', ' We look forward to meeting you and helping you find your new home!', 'Visit our website and take a Virtual Tour Today!', '<URL>/', 'Call us Today!', 'show contact info', 'Details',
